user_query: I want to surprise my friend who is a cryptocurrency enthusiast. Can you tell me the current prices of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dash? Additionally, provide me with the exchange rates for USD to EUR, GBP, and CHF. Finally, share a fun fact about world currencies.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the current price of Bitcoin.
Retrieve the current price of Ethereum.
Retrieve the current price of Dash.
Retrieve the exchange rate from USD to EUR.
Retrieve the exchange rate from USD to GBP.
Retrieve the exchange rate from USD to CHF.
Retrieve a fun fact about world currencies.
